name: Lair of goblins
description:
The goblins have stolen the gold collected in taxes from the villagers, and they have decided to hire a brave adventurer to recover it. Will you be the one to accomplish it?

Welcome to this casual action Roguelike, where the main objective is to retrieve the chest and return it to the villagers, but there are more challenges to face:

How quickly can you recover it?
Will you be able to eliminate all the goblins in their lair?
And the King, can you defeat him?

The goblins have infested the caves with dangerous traps, and they themselves are very deceitful.
You will have to use the few weapons available to you in the small shop set up by the villagers at the entrance of the dungeon.
The gold you can steal from these wretched green skins can be spent at this shop, but some weapons, although powerful, are fragile and will break with use. But don't worry! You can return to the shop whenever you want to replenish them.

Go ahead and return the cursed gold!
